summary: Comprehensive testing of CRUD functionality for Verkoop and Inkoop Orders and Offertes. All 17 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified - Edit/Delete buttons visible for concept status items, dialog shows 'Bewerken' title when editing.
critical_code_review_comments: PUT endpoints correctly restrict updates to concept status only for verkoop orders/offertes
Inkoop offertes allow updates for both concept and verzonden status (as designed)
DELETE endpoints correctly restrict deletion to concept/geannuleerd/verlopen/afgewezen status
Frontend properly shows Edit/Delete buttons only for concept status items
Dialog title correctly shows 'Bewerken' when editing existing items
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
seed_data_creation: Test data created with TEST_ prefix and cleaned up after each test
context_for_next_testing_agent: CRUD functionality for Orders and Offertes fully tested. Backend PUT endpoints: /api/verkoop/orders/{id}, /api/verkoop/offertes/{id}, /api/inkoop/orders/{id}, /api/inkoop/offertes/{id}. DELETE endpoints work for concept/geannuleerd status. Frontend pages at /app/boekhouding/verkoop/orders, /app/boekhouding/verkoop/offertes, /app/boekhouding/inkoop/orders, /app/boekhouding/inkoop/offertes.

verkoop_orders.update_non_concept: PASS - Correctly rejects update of non-concept orders (400)
verkoop_orders.delete_non_concept: PASS - Correctly rejects deletion of non-concept orders (400)

verkoop_offertes.update_non_concept: PASS - Correctly rejects update of non-concept offertes (400)

inkoop_orders.update_non_concept: PASS - Correctly rejects update of non-concept orders (400)

inkoop_offertes.update_verzonden: PASS - Can update verzonden offertes (as designed)

frontend_ui.verkoop_orders_page: PASS - Edit/Delete buttons visible for concept orders
frontend_ui.verkoop_offertes_page: PASS - Edit/Delete buttons visible for concept offertes
frontend_ui.inkoop_orders_page: PASS - Edit/Delete buttons visible for concept orders
frontend_ui.inkoop_offertes_page: PASS - Edit/Delete buttons visible for concept offertes
frontend_ui.edit_dialog_title: PASS - Shows 'Bewerken' in title when editing
